EmailTemplate.description: Includes customised survey link (Coveris 8 Week Post Program Survey) in SG3
EmailTemplate.name: Coveris 8 Week Survey Reminder 2
EmailTemplate.subject: ENSI Final Survey - Impact & Value
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
A friendly reminder today to advise that this is your last chance to complete the online survey on how ENS has had impact and value to you.
Click below to access the survey. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1725411/ENS-Eight-Week-Must-Win-Can-t-Fail-Impact-and-Value-Survey?jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c} The survey link is specific to you, please don't forward to others.
It would be appreciated if you could complete your response by: {!Contact.Job_3_month_case_study_due__c}.
We really appreciate your feedback.
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
